grid_refresh.label: Auto-refresh order grid
grid_refresh.comment: This auto-adds new orders into the Orders page grid - you may find this confusing if you're doing more than 1 sale every few minutes.

bottom_statistics.label: Show Order Statistics block
bottom_statistics.comment:
This shows a 24h/7d/30d summary of sales/cancels/refunds in the Orders page footer.
This won't show in the Dashboard.

show_menu_icon_hints.label: - - Show menubar icon hints?
show_menu_icon_hints.comment: (Turn off for a more minimal look)

change_body_background.label: Change body background for all admin pages?

chart_statuses.label: - - Charts count which order statuses?
chart_statuses.comment: (Changing this will result in inaccurate charts for some time, while we re-index orders.)

show_low_stock_warnings.label: Show Low Stock Warnings panel?
show_low_stock_warnings.comment: You need stockEasy installed for this to work
